title: Coffee consumption in the U.S. 2013/14 - 2018/19
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Consumption in million 60-kilogram bags, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018/2019 to 2016/2017.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015/2016 to 2013/2014.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016/2017 to 2015/2016.
gold: Coffee consumption in the United States amounted to nearly 26.5 million 60-kilogram bags in the 2018/2019 fiscal year . This is an increase from the total U.S. coffee consumption in the previous fiscal year , at 25.84 million 60-kilogram bags in the United States . Coffee production The coffee plant has its origins in Ethiopia and is now grown all over the world .
